attributes.action: Re enstate the death penalty for Pedophiles and murderes
attributes.additional_details:
Re-enstate the death penalty. Do not Protect Murderes.
Child killers violate and take away the rights of their victim yet our goverment does not impose harsh enough punishment for these so called human beings who cling on to their human rights with no concern for the human rights they have taken away from their victims. I believe that their rights are relinquished as soon as they have commited the hanus crime and they cannot be rehabilitated into society. Help protect our children.
